mapper.insert: insert into tb_space_set( eid, serviceId, eidName, name, address, createUser, phone, label, createTime, updateTime ) values ( #{eid}, #{serviceId}, #{eidName}, #{name}, #{address}, #{createUser}, #{phone}, #{label}, now(), now() )
mapper.update:
update tb_space_set
name = #{name},
address = #{address},
updateTime = now()
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, eid, name, eidName, address, createUser, phone, label, createTime from tb_space_set where id = #{id}
